short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ASAP with AI. Save more, categorize & analyze as you browse to Airtable, Coda, Notion and elsewhere.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
𝗙𝗲𝗮𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲𝘀
- Extract data and save it to your preferred platform, such as Airtable, Coda, Notion, Google Calendar, Email, or any Webhook URL
- Use AI to extract and categorize information for you, no matter where you save
-  Update corresponding records in your database while you browse the web
- Create new Airtable tables in seconds with AI assistance
- Autofill URLs, images, headers, descriptions, and more
- Take screenshots
- Select and focus on specific areas of your screen to achieve more accurate data extraction
- Run autofills quickly with keyboard shortcuts

𝗨𝘀𝗲𝗰𝗮𝘀𝗲𝘀
⚡ Save and organize websites, including portfolios, competitor sites, and more
⚡ Content management - quickly add new content and update existing content. Manage Airtable / Coda / Notion content for Softr, Glide and other websites using such database as backend
⚡ Enhance your Airtable CRM by seamlessly updating contacts and organizations when visiting their websites, social media profiles, or communicating across various platforms
⚡ Content auditing - review content under different URLs and save notes
⚡ Social media - save information about followers, posts
⚡ Products - save products of any kind and categorize it to your database
⚡ Migrations - transfer content from legacy websites and migrate to new structures
⚡ Easily add records to Airtable, Coda, or Notion directly from your web browser
⚡ Trigger automated workflows in platforms like Zapier, Make, Pipedream, Relay, and more to streamline your processes
